original_title: 新人20歳の夢。あの日、AV女優になるって決めて987日AVデビュー 白桃はな
overview: "I decided to become an AV actress in the summer of my sophomore year of high school." When she turned 20, she dreamed of becoming an AV actress and made her AV debut! ! Her parents' home is the daughter of a famous kimono shop in the local area, and she has a past as a local idol. She takes off her kimono that she can put on by herself, becomes completely naked, and has her first sex in front of her camera! The first Ippo of the girl who made her dream come true has now started.
title: Fresh Face Dreams Of A 20 Year Old. AV Debut 987 Days After That Day She Decided To Be An AV Actress Hana Shirato
